course_title: This Strange & Sacred Scripture: Wrestling with the Old Testament & All its Oddities
class_notes: (course in the community with Peachtree Christian) (HYBRID: meets in person off-campus at Peachtree Christian Church 1580 Peachtree St NW Atlanta, GA 30309 on Wednesday nights; required synchronous live sessions online via Zoom are Friday Noon-1:00pm)
course_description:
The OT can seem strange, even disturbing. How do we make sense of texts that portray God as wrathful or relate to all of the laws & rituals? How can we respond to portrayals of women, foreigners, immigrants, & strangers? What do we make of topics like purity, holiness, justice, lament, & sabbath in light of today's realities?
This course will make a case for how & why your effectiveness in ministry hinges on your diligent & committed attention to the OT. Emphasis will be placed on asking honest & difficult questions about the meaning of the text.
